attributes.action: The right to sack Members of Parliament
attributes.additional_details:
For too long MPs have blatently lied to the public to get elected and either gone back on election pledges or just done the opposite, this cant continue, MPs should be accountable to the public for their bad policies, the public need the right to easily remove bad MPs.
If 35% of the turnout of the previous election demand it a new election should be called in the constituancy.
attributes.background: Give us the right to remove MPs that are not properly representing their constituants and deviating from their manifesto promises.

rejection.details:
Give people power to dismiss MPs – change the Recall of MPs Act
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/732555
